name: Drata
description: Compliance automation platform — SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, GDPR framework management

tools: list_controls — List compliance controls and their status
get_control — Get control details and evidence

setup_steps: 1. Request MCP access from Drata support (currently experimental)
2. Generate API key in Drata → Settings → API
3. Drata hosts the MCP server — no self-hosting required
security_notes: Drata-hosted MCP server — you don't manage the infrastructure
Read-only by default — cannot modify compliance controls via MCP
API key should be scoped to compliance reader role
Compliance data is sensitive — audit who has MCP access
